properties.description: Authors of the item; Full author names are entered when they appear in the author position of an article, usually on the title page of an article.
properties.title: Authors

properties.description: Information pertaining to either the Newspaper or Magazine which contains this resource.
properties.title: Host Resource

properties.description: Volume the article is published in.
properties.title: Volume

properties.description: The issue of the volume the paper corresponds with.
properties.title: Issue

properties.description: Abstract or summary of the item
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: A collection of fields that are used to identify this publication for a variety of systems and purposes.
properties.title: Identifiers

properties.description: Digital object identifier of the item
properties.title: DOI

properties.description: A URI for the item, potentially an HTTP URL.
properties.title: Official URL

properties.description: Notes, comments, corrections to the publication record; typically done by library staff or other administrators of the system
properties.title: Additional Information
